ComicInfo.Summary:
Year two of Marvel Action: Avengers begins here! Grab your favorite teammate and strap in for adventure, Avengers-style! Every issue of this humorous, fun-filled series will find an Avenger paired up with an unlikely fellow super hero to thwart the plans of outrageous villains! First up, Thor and Ant-Man go...antiquing? Anything to stop Loki's newest scheme!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Butch Mapa | 1-2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Jacob Edgar (a) & Protobunker (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 07:38:16. [CVDB743201]
ComicInfo.Characters: Ant-Man (Lang), Black Panther, Black Widow, Captain America, Carol Danvers, Chewie, Doctor Strange, Hawkeye, Hulk, Iron Man, Loki, Sam Wilson, Thor
